00057         I2Plistener(I2PServerSocket SS, I2PSocketManager S, NamedDB info, NamedDB database, Log _log, AtomicBoolean lives) {
00058                 this.database = database;
00059                 this.info = info;
00060                 this._log = _log;
00061                 this.socketManager = S;
00062                 this.serverSocket = SS;
00063                 this.lives = lives;
00064         }
00065 
00070         public void run() {
00071                 boolean g = false;
00072                 I2PSocket sessSocket = null;
00073                 int conn = 0;
00074                 try {
00075                         try {
00076                                 serverSocket.setSoTimeout(50);
00077 
00078                                 while (lives.get()) {
00079                                         try {
00080                                                 sessSocket = serverSocket.accept();
00081                                                 g = true;
00082                                         } catch (ConnectException ce) {
00083                                                 g = false;
00084                                         } catch (SocketTimeoutException ste) {
00085                                                 g = false;
00086                                         }
00087                                         if (g) {
00088                                                 g = false;
00089                                                 conn++;
00090                                                 // toss the connection to a new thread.
00091                                                 I2PtoTCP conn_c = new I2PtoTCP(sessSocket, info, database, lives);
00092                                                 Thread t = new Thread(conn_c, Thread.currentThread().getName() + " I2PtoTCP " + conn);
00093                                                 t.start();
00094                                         }
00095 
00096                                 }
00097                         } catch (I2PException e) {
00098                                 // bad shit
00099                                 System.out.println("Exception " + e);
00100                         }
00101                 } finally {
00102                         try {
00103                                 serverSocket.close();
00104                         } catch (I2PException ex) {
00105                         }
00106                 // System.out.println("I2Plistener: Close");
00107                 }
00108         }
00109 }
